dishes.name: Honey Soy Glazed Salmon
dishes.description: A delicious lightly-baked Salmon, drizzled in a marinade of soy sauce, honey, ginger, and garlic.

dishes.name: Spicy Chickpea Curry
dishes.description: A hearty curry made with chickpeas simmered in a blend of tomatoes, onions, garlic, and warm Indian spices.

dishes.name: Lemon Herb Grilled Chicken
dishes.description: Chicken breasts marinated in a zesty blend of lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, and fresh herbs, and grilled.

dishes.name: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
dishes.description: A creamy Italian risotto made with arborio rice, fresh mushrooms, parmesan cheese, and a hint of white wine.
